articles.title: IPL 'next big step' to grow women's game, says NZ captain Devine - Reuters
articles.description: Franchise cricket has raised the profile of women's cricket and a full-fledged Indian Premier League (IPL) is the "next step" for its growth, New Zealand captain Sophie Devine said.
